text: @mjrowland68 @BreakfastNews Scott Morrison's  LNP/IPA government represents everything I abhor and despise. I can't bear the thought of enduring two more years of it, and am particularly concerned about what the fossil fueled National COVID-19 Coordination Commission is plotting.
